gw.api.graph.print

Class ColoringDotFormatter<T extends java.lang.Object>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.print.ColoringDotFormatter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DotFormatter<T>

    public class ColoringDotFormatter<T extends java.lang.Object>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DotFormatter<T>
    A decorating DotFormatter that colors nodes and/or edges.
